version_description:
• Disabled ability to tap anywhere on a fader and have it move to that position
• Added Aux channel
• Added FX Channels

If you have a minute and enjoy X Air Controller, please leave a review. It helps a lot and I appreciate hearing your feedback. Thank you

• You can now auto scan for mixers connected to your network for easier discovery
• Improve connection with mixer with reactive alerts
• Improve responsiveness of UI elements
If you have a minute and enjoy X Air Controller, please consider leaving a review. It helps a lot and I appreciate hearing your feedback. Thank you!

• Add ability to sync from mixer settings or app settings once connected
• Add ability to hide channels, from the left settings menu
• Fixed issue with FX channel name not sending to mixer
• Minor connection improvements
If you have a minute and enjoy X Air Controller, please consider leaving a review. It helps a lot and I appreciate hearing your feedback. Thank you!
